import {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import notmessageimg from '../../../assets/images/no_message.png'; function ContentChat(props) { const [message, setMessage] = useState(''); const [user, setUser] = useState(); function sendMessage() { if (message.trim() === '') return; props.client.send(JSON.stringify({ message })); setMessage(''); }; function handelSend(){ sendMessage(); } useEffect(()=>{ console.log(message); }, [message]) // console.log(props.friend); return (
